title: Random DCing during game
body: Has anyone else had this problem on the current patch? I can't play a game without disconnecting about 7-10 times. My internet is fine and my game runs smooth.

replies.body: That is a lot of disconnections!  Even if your internet seems fine doing other things, it sounds clear that you're specifically struggling to reach the game server.  :/  I highly recommend sticking to customs for now and running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.
